__e: I've always been poor and usually been happy.
I'm not poor, though I barely get by.
What if the man you love is poor but good, like Father?
And God forbid if the poor and hungry should try to take something from you.
She only married you because I was poor... and she was tired of waiting.
I'm a poor man Your Excellency.
It looks to me like the good Lord's got it in good and plenty for a poor man.
You know what's on the back of a poor man when he dies?
I come from a very poor family.
If you're bringing them into a poor family, what's the point? (CRYING) KARL: What good is that for anyone?
Imagine you were born in a poor family, in a poor city, in a poor country, and by the time you were 28 years old, you have so much money you can't even count it.
Poor and obscure as you are, please accept me as your husband.
# You may be poor or rich # It doesn't matter which
